contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox single | Name = You & I | Cover = You & I.jpg | Artist = [[Graham Coxon]] | from Album = <br />[[Love Travels at Illegal Speeds]] | B-side = "See Saw",<br/>"Click Click Click",<br/>"Light Up Your Candles" | Released = 8 May 2006 | Format = [[gramophone record|7"]], [[CD single|CD]], [[Maxi single|Maxi-CD]] | Recorded = 2005 | Genre = [[Alternative rock]] | Length = 3:43 | Label = [[Parlophone]] | Producer = [[Stephen Street]] | Reviews = <nowiki></nowiki> | Last single = "[[Standing on My Own Again]]"<br>(2006) | This single = "You & I"<br>(2006) | Next single = "[[I Can't Look at Your Skin / What's He Got?|I Can't Look at Your Skin" / "What's He Got?]]"<br>(2006) |}} "'''You & I'''" is a song from [[Graham Coxon]]'s sixth studio [[album]], ''[[Love Travels at Illegal Speeds]]''. It was released 8 May 2006 as the second [[single (music)|single]] from that album, charting at #39 in the [[UK Singles Chart]] (see [[2006 in British music]]). The [[b-side]] for the [[gramophone record|7"]] version of the single is a cover of [[The Jam]] song "See Saw" that backed "[[The Eton Rifles]]" single in late 1979. The b-side for both [[compact disc|CD]] versions of the single, "Click Click Click", was originally available on the [[Japan]]ese pressing of the album. ==Track listings== *Promo CD <small>CDRDJ6691</small>, released in early April 2006 #"You & I" - 3:43 *7" <small>R6691</small> #"You & I" - 3:43 #"See Saw" (cover of The Jam song) *CD <small>CDR6691</small> #"You & I" - 3:43 #"Click Click Click" - 2:54 *Maxi-CD <small>CDRS6691</small> #"You & I" - 3:43 #"Light Up Your Candles" - 3:29 #"Click Click Click" - 2:54 #"You & I" (video) <gallery> <!-- Deleted image removed: Image:You & I promo.JPG|Promo CD --> Image:You & I.jpg|7" (R6691),<br/>Maxi-CD (CDRS6691) <!-- Deleted image removed: Image:You & I 2.jpg|CD (CDR6691) --> </gallery> ==External links== *[http://themusiczine.com/single.php?id=69 TheMusicZine review] *[http://www.musicomh.com/singles6/graham-coxon-5_0506.htm musicOMH.com | single review] {{Graham Coxon}} {{DEFAULTSORT:You and I (Graham Coxon song)}} [[Category:2006 singles]] [[Category:Graham Coxon songs]] [[Category:Song recordings produced by Stephen Street]]
